segments.text: I can't believe my eyes in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on full blast, water cascading over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the adult is just drying dishes, not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she miss the flood at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for cookies like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl helping him, both sneaking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; kids could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks ready to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, everything is orderly in the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the inside mess even more frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could yell to turn off the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids need supervision right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
